>If anyone has any good ideas, email me and let me know.

I'll have something big for you in a few weeks: a saved game file with 
most characters whose max strength is at the point where it doesn't 
cost anything to go higher.  So far, only 2 characters go all the way 
for purchasing stats: Skeletons and Barbarians, for a max value of 
strength of 32767.  That is a good number.

This dream team I am creating should be powerfull to beat a certain 
ocean going scenario in Televido's set.
